onPlayerConnect(Connection) - Method in class csci331.team.red.server.ServerEngine
Callback for when a player requests connection to the server There are a max of ServerEngine.MAX_PLAYERS players allowed This method also binds a Connection to a Role via NetServer.setRole(Connection, Role)
